item.title: Smog and transport resolution in Krak√≥w
item.author: adam.czepielik@gmail.com (Adam Czepielik)
item.description: In this post I take a look at the resolution providing free transport for car drivers in case of huge air pollution, adopted in Krakow in 2015. Three versions of this resolution have been in use. In the first version, decision about providing free transport was on a basis of measurements from the previous day. But this method was criticized for having one-day lags in decisions. In the next version decisions were based on forecasts.
